allorsUnifiedGood.name: FINKBEINER EHB807V11
allorsUnifiedGood.description:
| Technical data |    Information |
| ---- | ----- |
Load support | 		Adjustable wheel forks  155R13 - 13R 22.5, Ø 550 - 1140 mm
|  Length of lifting fork 385 mm, suitable for super singles
Lifting stroke 			| 1750 mm
Speed 				| Up 70 sec., Down 60 sec.  
| Slow speed for fine positioning
| Soft start with continuous increase of speed
Operation 			| Up / Down from each column
| Operation modes: All / Single
| Interconnecting cables from column to column around the vehicle in a circuit with one open end to drive-in/out
| Interconnecting cable per slave column, plugs on both ends, length 10 m
| Power supply cable 10 m at master column
| Max. 24 columns per lift set (4 master, 20 slave columns)
Display indication 		| LCD display at master column, optional at slave columns
| Active columns within lift set
| Active operation mode
| Height in „mm“
Control 			| Smooth synchronisation without abrupt speed variations, height tolerance of max. 2 mm  
| Continuous monitoring of all operational functions  
| Control voltage 24V DC
Drive 				| Electro-hydraulic
| Motor 2.2 KW per column
| Hydraulic cylinder self-lubricating, cylinder rod encased by steel tube
| Proportional valves for smooth control without any increments
Connection 			| 400 V / 3 Ph / 50 Hz, fuse 35 A (per master column)
Positioning wheels 		| Rear: wheel jack, spring-loaded, with locking brake
| Front: Retractable spring-loaded front wheels for minimum floor pressure
Dimensions 			| 1150 x 1130 x 2255 mm (l x w x h) per column 	
Weight 			| 540 kg per column
Protection class 		| IP 65
Safety features 		| Double load securing with hydraulic and mechanical locks  
| Hydraulic pressure relief valve preventing overload
| Main switch lockable, with emergency stop at each column
Safety standards 		| CE, EN 1493
